Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.user

Interface IUserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserService
public interface IUserService
Interface defining user-related operations in the application. Provides methods for managing users, including registration, updates, deletion, and retrieval of user information.

  • Method Details

    • register

      UserDto register(RegistrationRequest request)
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      request - the registration details of the user.
      Returns:
      the newly registered User.

    • update

      UserDto update(Long userId, UserUpdateRequest request)
      Updates an existing user's information.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update.
      request - the updated user details.
      Returns:
      the updated User.

    • findById

      User findById(Long userId)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the User entity with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID.

    • deleteById

      void deleteById(Long userId)
      Deletes a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to delete.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if no user is found with the given ID.

    • getUserWithDetails

      UserDto getUserWithDetails(Long userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves detailed information about a user, including appointments and reviews.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a UserDto containing detailed user information.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs while retrieving user-related data.

    • countVeterinarians

      long countVeterinarians()
      Counts the total number of veterinarians in the system.
      Returns:
      the count of users with the role "VET".

    • countPatients

      long countPatients()
      Counts the total number of patients in the system.
      Returns:
      the count of users with the role "PATIENT".

    • countAllUsers

      long countAllUsers()
      Counts the total number of users in the system.
      Returns:
      the total count of users.

    • aggregateUsersByMonthAndType

      Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByMonthAndType()
      Aggregates user counts by their registration month and type.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the registration month (e.g., "January"), and the value is another map containing user types as keys and their counts as values.

    • aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType

      Map<String,Map<String,Long>> aggregateUsersByEnabledStatusAndType()
      Aggregates user counts by their enabled status and type.
      Returns:
      a map where the key is the enabled status ("Enabled" or "Non-Enabled"), and the value is another map containing user types as keys and their counts as values.

    • lockUserAccount

      void lockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Locks a user's account, preventing them from logging in.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be locked.

    • unLockUserAccount

      void unLockUserAccount(Long userId)
      Unlocks a user's account, allowing them to log in again.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose account will be unlocked.

    • getPhotoUrlByUserId

      String getPhotoUrlByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves the URL of the photo associated with a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose photo URL is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      a String representing the URL of the user's photo, or null if the user has no associated photo.
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - if the user with the specified ID is not found.

    • populateUserReviewDetails

      void populateUserReviewDetails(UserDto userDto, Long userId)
      Populates a UserDto with review details for the given user.

      This method:

      • Retrieves all reviews associated with the user.
      • Maps the retrieved reviews to ReviewDto objects.
      • Calculates and sets the user's average rating based on their reviews.
      • Updates the total number of reviewers.
      • Attaches the mapped reviews to the UserDto.

      This is typically used for displaying a veterinarian's or user's reviews along with their profile information.

      Parameters:
      userDto - the UserDto to populate with review details.
      userId - the ID of the user whose review details should be retrieved and added.
